data.fullContent: The historic El Rey Inn is located in Santa Fe. It sat along the original path of historic Route 66, although the route was shifted not long after the building was constructed. The buildings are designed to resemble traditional housing of the Southwest. While the building is over 80 years old, it has been renovated in recent years.
data.answer: 历史悠久的El Rey Inn酒店位于圣达菲。它坐落在具有历史意义的66号公路的原路线上，尽管在建筑建成后不久路线就被改变了。这些建筑的设计类似于西南地区的传统住宅。尽管这座建筑已经有80多年的历史，但近年来已经进行了翻修。
